Kyle Langford

Web Designer and Developer

Hello!

I work as a Senior Designer and Frontend Developer for a Boston based web agency. I have 10 years experience and have worked on over 70 sites/apps and 100s of projects over that time. I have expert knowledge of web technologies and standards. I am passionate about helping people use technology through design. I have a positive attitude and enjoy working on all types of projects.
